nodes.text: The Garrote was an attack cruiser of the Imperial Navy. After the Battle of Jakku, the cruiser was sent to hide in the Queluhan Nebula along with other ships belonging to the remnants of the Galactic Empire. Commander Nash Windrider was promoted as the Garrote's Flight Commander. The ship carried TIE fighters in its docking bay, and Windrider had his own office adjacent to the hangar.
The Garrote first appeared in the 2015 canon novel Lost Stars, by Claudia Gray.
